snippet: For the quarter ended Sept. 30, the company said it earned $108 million, or 44 cents a share, down from $200 million, or 76 cents a share, a year earlier.
abstract: NYSE Euronext, operator of the New York Stock Exchange and other stock markets, says that its third-quarter profit fell 46 percent on a decline in trading volumes; company reports earnings of $108 million, or 44 cents a share, down from $200 million, or 76 cents a share, in the comparable quarter last year; revenue dropped 28 percent to $902 million from $1.26 billion; accounting for transaction-based expenses, revenue fell 21 percent to $559 million.
lead_paragraph: For the quarter ended Sept. 30, the company said it earned $108 million, or 44 cents a share, down from $200 million, or 76 cents a share, a year earlier.

headline.seo: NYSE Euronext Reports 46% Decline in Profit
headline.main: Decline in Trading Volume Hurts Profit at NYSE Euronext
headline.print_headline: Decline in Trading Volume Hurts Profit at NYSE Euronext
